price: 7. Que n’amènes-tu pas avec toi des Anges si tu dis vrai ? »
arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: law mā tatīnā bil-malāikati in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
